glsa.title: OpenSCAD: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in OpenSCAD might allow remote attacker(s) to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: OpenSCAD is the programmerâ€™s solid 3D CAD modeller.

description.p: A buffer overflow exists in OpenSCAD when parsing STL files.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted STL file using OpenSCAD, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenSCAD users should upgrade to the latest version:
